title: Disney Invests BIG in Epic & Fortnite - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.08.24
description:
Shop the new collections at kindafunny.com/store!

Blessing and Tim talk about Disney investing in Fortnite, react to the new Knuckles trailer, and chat about bad news for Toys For Bob.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:27 - Housekeeping
 - PS I Love You XOXO is happening live for everyone at 4pm pacific right after the stream. It’ll be our Helldivers impressions. Right here on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
 - Two new drops on the merch store! Kinda Funny Broadcast and the Cozy collection are available for the next two weeks on kindafunny.com/store, grab ‘em while you can!
 - KFAF is coming back on February 9th for Part 2 of our Anniversary Stream! The photoshop challenge’s theme is “The Future”. Tweet your photoshops @KindaFunnyVids with #KFAF to join in on the fun!
      -  The Roper Report   -
00:09:00 - Disney invests $1.5 billion in Epic
00:29:22 - A new Knuckles trailer just dropped
00:36:12 - Ubisoft says Assassin’s Creed Codename Red will be released by March 2025
00:46:38 - Toys for Bob’s Future is Unclear Amid Studio Closure and Layoffs
00:52:06 - FTC files complaint against Microsoft over recent Xbox layoffs
00:56:05 - Wee News!
00:59:00 - SuperChats
01:02:08 - You‘re Wrong
